item.title: Spock is Not Impressed by these 55 "Old" Social Media Sites
item.description: Spock is not impressed at all by the social web. You might get his attention from time to time but he’s just not impressed. All images available at http://www.flickr.com/socialnerdia Inspired by +Sean Bonner’s http://spockisnotimpressed.tumblr.com/

item.title: Developing a Progressive Mobile Strategy
item.description: My presentation given at HighEdWeb Rochester on June 27, 2011. It focuses on how universities should think about developing and building out their strategy for mobile devices. The future of mobile in higher ed is much larger than one app or one website. Numbers regarding adoption of mobile overall as well as at West Virginia University are included.
item.content:encoded: My presentation given at HighEdWeb Rochester on June 27, 2011. It focuses on how universities should think about developing and building out their strategy for mobile devices. The future of mobile in higher ed is much larger than one app or one website. Numbers regarding adoption of mobile overall as well as at West Virginia University are included.

media:content.media:text: My presentation given at HighEdWeb Rochester on June 27, 2011. item.title: Atlantis Makes Space Shuttle Program's Final Landing STS-135
item.description: Atlantis and the STS-135 crew touched down at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center in Florida just before dawn on July 21, 2011, wrapping up the final mission of the 30-year space shuttle program. This video also is available at http://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/videogallery/index.html?media_id=102483531
item.content:encoded: Atlantis and the STS-135 crew touched down at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center in Florida just before dawn on July 21, 2011, wrapping up the final mission of the 30-year space shuttle program. This video also is available at http://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/videogallery/index.html?media_id=102483531
item.author: nasa@slideshare.net(nasa)

media:content.media:title: Atlantis Makes Space Shuttle Program's Final Landing STS-135
media:content.media:description:
Atlantis and the STS-135 crew touched down at NASA's Kennedy Space Center in Florida just before dawn on July 21, 2011, wrapping up the final mission of the 30-year space shuttle program.
This video also is available at http://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/videogallery/index.html?media_id=102483531
media:content.media:text: Atlantis and the STS-135 crew touched down at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center in Florida just before dawn on July 21, 2011, wrapping up the final mission of the 30-year space shuttle program. This video also is available at http://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/videogallery/index.html?media_id=102483531

Atlantis Makes Space Shuttle Program's Final Landing STS-135
